Class MutableBindings

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.r2dbc.core.binding.Bindings
org.springframework.r2dbc.core.binding.MutableBindings
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Bindings.Binding>
public class MutableBindings extends Bindings
Mutable extension to Bindings for Value and null bindings for a Statement using BindMarkers.
Since:
5.3
Author:
Mark Paluch
